title: FPS drops when in club
body:
Own one club and am in another, every person in the club is having massive FPS problems in the client
From what I've seen, it's also not just us

replies.body: I personally haven't noticed it but many people are complaining about this in club chat. It only seems to effect the client. In game is fine.

Seems to be quite common right now. Check [this thread for some questions to answer so the issue can be investigated further](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/xMFyePnf-client-feels-slow-after-club-update?comment=0006)
After further testing, it appears that this drop only occurs when you're grouping with people from your club
Cant even accept games now, is anyone else having issues with this?
